data.body: In waves/trees view, closed parent items are rendered (example wave 'mckellen-gladiator'). Also tree/wave titles currently show wave name + wave title but do not include wave id. Required: prepend stripped wave id before wave name in each title.
data.description: In waves/trees view, closed parent items are rendered (example wave 'mckellen-gladiator'). Also tree/wave titles currently show wave name + wave title but do not include wave id. Required: prepend stripped wave id before wave name in each title.
data.title: wave tree shows closed parents and omits wave id in title
